page.title: 13The Rector of Laceby
page.content: The Rector of Laceby has lived in the village for 2 years.The church is very old and was built about the time of the first Domesday book.The rector has many jobs to do.He prays to God to ask him to the bless the village and he leads worship at St Margarets Church.There are two services on Sundays and he preaches at each one.He listens to people with problems,visits sick people,talks to couples wanting to get married and also helps people to understand Christian baptism.He is chaplain of Laceby British Legion and he has to prepare special services for festivals like Easter and Christmas.He has very little spare time and enjoys his ministry in Laceby.
